objects.description: [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) allows actors to spawn a reverse shell on a victim.(Citation: Eset PlugX Korplug Mustang Panda March 2022)(Citation: CIRCL PlugX March 2013)(Citation: Dell TG-3390)(Citation: EclecticIQ Mustang Panda PlugX)(Citation: Google Threat Intelligence Group MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX August 2025)(Citation: Sophos PlugX September 2022)
